title: MD
biography: Willem Einthoven was a Dutch medical doctor and physiologist. He invented the first practical electrocardiograph in 1895 and received the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 1924 for it.
aiSummary: Willem Einthoven is a cardiology specialist with an H-index of 18 at Leiden University (Member). Has been published in Koninklijke Nederlandse Akademie van Wetenschappen Proceedings Series B Physical Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
